name: lost_in_cyberspace
description:
The year is 3055. After a meltdown hit the world router, thousands of kids got stuck in cyberspace. Only you, Jack Gibson, ex-cyberspace marine turned private detective, can save them. Bring those kids home, Jack. One last time.

Credits: Arnoud Polljonker, Steff Kempink, Gerben Pasjes, Valentinas Rimeika, Tom Hoesstee, Robin Zaagsma
